01b7b42a05c4eda9333b35f7af8bdb8dddf2be7e.query:
UPDATE systems
        SET complete = true
        WHERE id = ?
        AND complete = false
        AND NOT EXISTS (
            SELECT g.id
            FROM games g
            WHERE g.system_id = systems.id
            AND g.complete = false
            AND g.sorting != 2
        )

0b1ea5a5b61f9db176368b014ecbb4fd5a90f1aa.query:

        SET name = ?, version = ?, size = ?, system_id = ?

0d3a00cedda8f4e17b47a6db3397e7498c8c38cf.query:
UPDATE games
        SET complete = true
        WHERE system_id = ?
        AND complete = false
        AND jbfolder = false
        AND NOT EXISTS (
            SELECT r.id
            FROM roms AS r
            WHERE r.game_id = games.id
            AND r.romfile_id IS NULL
        )

0f14cf5e8d2fab4ef93be721a6994b753cbb5564.query:
SELECT *
        FROM romfiles
        WHERE id IN (
            SELECT DISTINCT(romfile_id)
            FROM roms
            WHERE game_id IN (
                SELECT id
                FROM games
                WHERE system_id = ?
            )
        )

0ff86fd646cafebe132398b5be88b22131495acd.query:
SELECT *
        FROM games
        WHERE system_id = ?
        ORDER BY name

10fe686c3d9bc58fa6a9dbda4fe9564144c28157.query:
UPDATE games
        SET complete = false
        WHERE system_id = ?
        AND complete = true
        AND EXISTS (
            SELECT r1.id
            FROM roms AS r1
            WHERE r1.game_id = games.id
            AND r1.romfile_id IS NULL
            AND (
                r1.parent_id IS NULL
                OR EXISTS (
                    SELECT r2.id
                    FROM roms AS r2
                    JOIN games AS g ON g.id = r2.game_id
                    WHERE r2.id = r1.parent_id
                    AND g.bios = false
                )
            )
        )
